channel.title: Budget on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Budget on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: In a win for science, NASA told to use House budget as shutdown looms
item.description: The House budget still cuts science at NASA, but not as deeply as the White House sought.

item.title: As White House talks about impounding NASA funding, Congress takes the threat seriously
item.description: “NASA appears to be acting in accordance with a fringe, extremist ideology.”
